Content:
Here are Microsoft's annual revenues in millions of US dollars:

| Fiscal Year | Revenue (in millions) |
| --- | --- |
| 2004 | $36,833 |
| 2005 | $40,285 |
| 2006 | $44,282 |
| 2007 | $51,124 |
| 2008 | $58,437 |
| 2009 | $62,408 |
| 2010 | $62,427 |
| 2011 | $69,943 |
| 2012 | $73,718 |
| 2013 | $77,859 |
| 2014 | $86,833 |
| 2015 | $93,580 |
| 2016 | $125,843 |
| 2017 | $110,360 |
| 2018 | $111,657 |
| 2019 | $125,843 |
| 2020 | $143,014 |
| 2021 | $168,059 |

Note: The fiscal year for Microsoft is from July to June, so the revenue figures listed above are for the company's fiscal years ending June 30th of the given year.

Source: Microsoft's Annual Reports and SEC filings.
